MESSAGE.value: John suggests using final integers to solve the health issue
Toms suggestion to use an Enumeration for the Health state
Enum code complete in Main Application
Added gotShot and collectedFirstAidKit to Character, tested in Main Application
Refactored code to the State Pattern
Template method pattern used to handle treatment of hostages and civilians
Added static integer for mission and objective counts Refactored Main Application to make it tidy
Made Gun and Interface with SimpleGun inheriting from it.
Fixed issues with State Pattern, some oversights
True programming to interface in Mission.... Added some more gameplay to test
Completed Refactor to Abstract Factory. All creation now encapsulated and extracted from main application.
Removed unnecessary semi-colon, John must have left that in......
Just added some input validation for the vehicle selection (Factory)
Added test directory and also a test class to test Character, the main class in the game
Removed unnecessary semi-colons
Renamed CharacterTest to StrategyTest and added DecoratorTest
Fixed code for "True" programming to an interface
Removed unused ArrayList import
Added TestComposite class which just tests the Level and Objective getters
Added Test class for Factory
Removed unnecessary import
Added class to test Adapter, before it's used and after
Renamed as it tests the State also
Added class to test Template Method
